input.sentences: she brought her bag to carry her purchases .

output.sentences: An individual carries out a bag full of groceries.
A man walks away with his luggage.
A pile full of garbage clutters up the walkway.
A woman sorts through the garbage to find a lost toy that belongs to her son.
A young boy wears a racist Native American costume.
